normalized: the fuluakia empire.
the most powerful country inceltoana, with a history thousands of yearslong.
during the age of magik, it had helda powerful influence over the entire continent.
however, 200 years ago, when the newage began, and the ripples of modernizationspread, its power began to fade.
the deciding factor was the faluakian emperor,but also, the choice to abandon the old ways of magikas well.
and at the same time, pursue the new form ofenergy that was being drawn up from the ancientearth.
in the span of a few years, swords were replacedby guns.
there was no trace of the warhorse to beseen.
no one at that time could have forseen where thiscould only lead to.
the worst war in celtoana's history began.
a hundred or so years have passed since then…
announcing the arrival of the commanderof the fuluakian knights,anastasia d.
faizland!
the solemn voice echoed between the walls andthe audience, and the doors opened as the ensemblebegan playing.
flowing into the room, like the breezeof wind that accompanied her, was a single,young high elf.
no.
while her innocent look matched her years, withinher pupils shone a spark.
she was warrior who hadseen many battles.
anastasia d.
faizland.
that was the name passed down by the royalhigh elf family who served as knights andprotected the fuluakia empire.

name: fuluakian emperor
normalized: ahh, anastasia…
a calm yet hoarse voice suddenlycalled out to the young high elf.

name: anastasia
normalized: you're majesty…thank you for going to the troubleof holding this ceremony for me.
bowing her head deeply, she turned her eyes upwardand settled her gaze on the man sitting high above therest.
the fuluakian emperor.
the high elf elder had served as the head of theempire for the past few decades.
but now, he leaned against his throne as if it werea cane, his gaze distant.

name: fuluakian emperor
normalized: anastasia, you came…you're even more beautiful than the rumorssay…
there was a hint of envy as he looked upon theyoung high elf, with such a bright future ahead ofher.

name: anastasia
normalized: thank you for your kind words, your majesty.
as a knight and servant of the empire,anastasisa kept her head bowed towards her ruler.

name: fuluakian emperor
normalized: from hence forth, you are head of thefaizland family, and the commander of thefuluakian knights.
while his voice was frail, it still carried with itan unexpected sense of authority.

name: fuluakian emperor
normalized: your duty is to defeat any enemy of the empire.
his voice then became bitter, colored with aresentment he made no effort to hide.

name: fuluakian emperor
normalized: to crush those that would oppose our rule…to eliminate the alliance that rebels against us.
the alliance that had formed over a hundred years ago,made up of the countries that opposed the empire's rule.

name: fuluakian emperor
normalized: entirely…yes, eliminate them entirely.
let not a drop of theirblood, nor a single hair from their heads remain….
the bitterness in his voice wasn't only his ownpersonal feelings, but also the feelings of all of thosewho were involved in the long, drawn out war.

name: fuluakian emperor
normalized: annihilate them、and bring an eternity ofpeace to our fair country.
that is your duty.
do you understand?

name: anastasia
normalized: yes…
anastasia bowed deeply once more,trying to avoid the emperor's gaze.

name: anastasia
normalized: （but…）
but exactly what did the "enemy" look like tothe emperor, who never moved from his throne?
how much could he know of the blood-soaked,muddy battelfield that he stayed so far away from?
how much did he really understand of the "enemy nation?

name: anastasia
normalized: （no…i musn't.
the young commander stopped her own train ofthought, and waited for her emperor's next words.

name: court noble
normalized: hmm…so this is the most gifted warrior said to evercome from our ranks….
but the next voice she heard did not come fromthe man sitting on the throne.

name: court noble
normalized: the faizland's before you for the last hundred yearshave failed to bring an end to this war.
the voice came from a man in the middle ofthe dozens of elders positioned beneath the emperor.
he did not seem to be here to celebrateher appointment as commander of the knights.

name: court noble
normalized: your looks have made you popular with the people evenbefore you were appointed, but whether you actuallyare as "gifted" as they say…
he was obviously looking down upon her.
he stared, as if about to run his tongue alongher body.
he was a member of the house of lords.
they formed the counterpart to thebody of warriors anastasia would lead.
in the old days, each individual was directlyunder the emperor's supervision, and eachfollowed his orders to enforce the laws.
however, in recent decades, that system haschanged, and the house of lords has a substantialgrip on the actual workings of the government.

name: court noble
normalized: do you understand, anastasia?
you, and those you lead, live toprotect this country and us.
the elder, hiding behind the protectionof his status with the court, continued speakingas his belly, swollen with gluttony, shook.

name: court noble
normalized: do not think of judging whether this country'slaws are right or wrong.
that is a job for thehouse of lords.
your job is to simply enforce them.
his greasy voice continued on.

name: court noble
normalized: should you ever even think about betraying hismajesty, and running off to join those alliance savageslike-…well, suffice to say you will regret it.

name: anastasia
normalized: i understand.
without even taking a moment to let hiswords sink in, anastasia raised her head.

name: anastasia
normalized: i…no, we, the knights of fuluakia, will serveas the sword of his majesty and this country.
her gaze was intense.

name: anastasia
normalized: those who oppose our empire, no matterwho they may be, will meet with the tip of ourblades.
her piercing eyes did not waver in theslightest.
her words, as sharp as a sword forgedfrom steel, and without a hint of emotion,seemed to pierce the elder.

name: anastasia
normalized: we, as the sword of his majesty, carry nodesires of our own, only those of the emperor.
we will cut down any who dare oppose him.
the elder, still being pierced by anastasia'sunwavering gaze, seemed to have lost the disdainfulmanner he had taken only moments before.

name: fuluakian emperor
normalized: heh heh…hahahaha!
a hoarse laugh echoed throughout theroom.
the emperor laughed and nodded inapproval.

name: fuluakian emperor
normalized: well then my valkyrie, on this fruitful day,where will you exert my power, in your firstcampaign as commander?
the emperor looked upon anastasiaas if he were inspecting a valuable pieceof art.

name: fuluakian emperor
normalized: i wonder what my sword will cut to pieces forme today?

name: anastasia
normalized: …altonia fortress, my beloved emperor.
anastasia answered promptly, almost as ifshe had thought of an answer before the emperorhad even asked.
both the members of the house of lordsand the emperor himself seemed to be takenaback.

name: court noble 1
normalized: are you crazy…?
did you just sayaltonia fortress?

name: court noble 2
normalized: altonia has been lost to us since a commanderof the alliance took it with armored forces…
it seemed anastasia had touched upon anunpleasant memory.
the group of elders stared at anastasiain disbelief.

name: fuluakian emperor
normalized: are you saying… you will take backaltonia fortress?

name: anastasia
normalized: yes, your majesty.
what better way to testthe power of your new sword?
allow me torecapture altonia fortress.
murmurs rose from the elders, still seeminglyunable to believe what the were hearing.

name: fuluakian emperor
normalized: kah ha ha ha ha ha!
the emperor's laugh seemed more livelythan before.

name: fuluakian emperor
normalized: very well, my beautiful sword.
recapture the territory that has beenstolen by those alliance dogs.

name: anastasia
normalized: yes, my majesty!
the emperor, having shown a hint ofexcitement in his voice for the first time inages, lowered his head as the commander turned.
the silver valkyrie.
the appointment ceremony of the youngcommander who had just taken on that namehad come to an end.
one hour later
with her appointment ceremony over,anastasia was now alone, in the most gaurdedvilla in the entire empire.

name: young voice
normalized: anastasia

name: anastasia
normalized: ah…
as soon as she heard the voice thathad called to her, she relaxed.

name: anastasia
normalized: my prince.
her expression was one that she would havenever shown in front of the elders.
both her manner and speech softened.

name: crown prince
normalized: is your ceremony over already?

name: anastasia
normalized: yes.
anastasia smiled shyly at the crown prince,who was younger than she.

name: crown prince
normalized: anastasia… i'm sorry.
but the young prince suddenly bowed hishead towards anastasia.

name: crown prince
normalized: this war that had been waged for more than150 years is largely the fault of the fuluakianroyal family.

name: anastasia
normalized: yes, my majesty?

name: crown prince
normalized: my family cannot be forgiven for what wehave done to the warriors of generations past,to the warriors that even now spill their blood
as the young prince spoke these words, hebowed his head once more towards anastasia.

name: anastasia
normalized: my majesty, please, do not bow to me.
anastasia could not help but become flustered athow sincere the crown prince's words and actions were.

name: anastasia
normalized: no, it is simply our duty as knights…it is what the faizland family decided long ago.

name: crown prince
normalized: anastasia…
sharing words that only the two of themunderstood, the prince slowly raised his head.

name: crown prince
normalized: are you… really okay with this?

name: anastasia
normalized: yes.
it is the long standing desireof the faizland family.
but…are you…?
once more, speaking in words that only the two of themunderstood, the young prince nodded.

name: crown prince
normalized: the only ones to blame for this country's descentinto depravity is my imperial family…
the prince's vision turned towards a certainindividual who was in the palace, far from where theyboth stood now.

name: crown prince
normalized: i, as successor to the throne, am the one who mustpay penance.

name: anastasia
normalized: my majesty…
no one could have known the conflicts that nowswirled inside the adolescent prince.
even if theycould have, they could not have alleviated him of it.

name: anastasia
normalized: your majesty….
i will serve as this country's…and your, sword.
as such, i will hold no desires of myown.
please, use me as you would wish.
anastasia repeated her lines once again.
no, perhaps she was only trying to become thecommander that she would need to be, in order tolead the knights.

name: anastasia
normalized: but, if i am to be a sword, then i would ask tobe able to choose the one who would wield me.

name: crown prince
normalized: you would choose me, yes?

name: anastasia
normalized: i would.
anastasia nodded deeply to theyoung prince who seemed to becomeslightly bashful as he had asked.

name: crown prince
normalized: i see… thank you, my knight.
seeing the prince stare as he did, anastasiasmiled slightly.

name: crown prince
normalized: but you know… i think i'd prefer it if youwould just loosen up a bit.

name: anastasia
normalized: huh?

name: crown prince
normalized: i mean, how long have you had to act likethat?
i bet your shoulders are stiff, right?
the young prince was only joking, butunderneath his jest lie a genuine concern foranastasia.

name: crown prince
normalized: i'm glad you take things seriously, but sometimesi worry you're a little too serious.

name: anastasia
normalized: i did not know i was causing his majestysuch a worry…
an embarrassed look appeared on anastasia,unsure of how to answer.

name: noa
normalized: anastasia!
as soon as that voice cried out,anastasia felt something collide into themiddle of her back.

name: anastasia
normalized: n-, noa？

name: noa
normalized: eh heh heh…
anastasia turned around in surprise.
standing there was a young girl, grinning.
her ears almost blended into her tufts of hair.
she was dressed in the knight's uniform, but a tailstuck out from beneath her coat.
the young girl belonged to the beast tribe,though they had almost been driven to extinctionin recent years.

name: noa
normalized: preperation for the deployment of the drachedivision is complete!

name: anastasia
normalized: h-hey!
you're in front of the crown prince!
mind your manners!

anastasiagave her a stern look.

name: anastasia
normalized: m-my apologies, your majesty.
this is amember of the faizland family.
she has justjoined the knights today.
anastasia introduced her as if introducing hertroublesome younger sister.

name: crown prince
normalized: haha…looks like i was worried for nothing.

name: anastasia
normalized: hm…?
your majesty…?

normalized: it's nothing.

then he turnedto noa.

name: crown prince
normalized: you…you're called noa, right?

name: noa
normalized: y-yes!
noa, as if finally realizing the one that stoodbefore her was the next emperor, stood at attention.
her tail hung down, but swayed back and forth slightly.

name: crown prince
normalized: i want you to look out for anastasia.

name: noa
normalized: y-yes sir!
anastasia always helps noa out, so inreturn, noa will look out for her!

normalized: …noa, how many times have i told you,you have to say "i," not "noa.

normalized: ah….
sorry…

normalized: haha…

name: crown prince
normalized: anastasia.
but his expression soon changed to thatof grave sincerity.

name: crown prince
normalized: i don't know how long it's going to take.
but would you fight for this country's…no,for celtoana's future?

name: anastasia
normalized: of course.
if that is what you wish…

name: crown prince
normalized: well then, anastasia, commander of theknights, let me offer my blessings towardsyour first campaign.

normalized: i would be honored.
i am yours to command.
